scripts.build:db: bun run src/index.ts && echo "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS app_settings; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS restock_items; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS scanned_boxes; DROP INDEX IF EXISTS idx_restock_items_cis_code; DROP INDEX IF EXISTS idx_restock_items_expiry_date; DROP INDEX IF EXISTS idx_scanned_boxes_scan_timestamp; DROP INDEX IF EXISTS idx_scanned_boxes_unique;" | sqlite3 data/reference.db && sqlite3 data/reference.db ".schema" > data/reference_schema.drift
scripts.generate: bun run build && bun run export-schema
scripts.tool: bun run tool/export_preview.ts && bun run tool/audit_data.ts
scripts.preflight: bun test && bun run build:db && bun run tool
scripts.preflight:bp: bun run build:db && bun run tool
